search.query: index=redhatinsights | spath | rename object.* as * | spath path=events{} output=events | stats by timestamp, events, application, event_type, account_id, context.display_name, | mvexpand events | eval _raw=events | kv | eval DRIFT_URL = "https://console.redhat.com/insights/drift/baselines/" | eval POLICIES_URL = "https://console.redhat.com/insights/policies/policy/" | eval COMPLIANCE_URL = "https://console.redhat.com/insights/compliance/systems/" | eval INVENTORY_URL = "https://console.redhat.com/insights/inventory/" | eval application = upper(substr(application,1,1)).substr(application,2) | eval title=case(event_type=="new-recommendation",'payload.rule_description', event_type=="resolved-recommendation",'payload.rule_description', event_type=="deactivated-recommendation", 'payload.rule_description', event_type=="policy-triggered", 'payload.policy_name'." policy triggered", event_type=="drift-baseline-detected","Drift detected from ".'payload.baseline_name'." baseline", event_type=="compliance-below-threshold",'payload.policy_name', event_type=="report-upload-failed", 'payload.error', !isnull(event_type), 'event_type') | eval time=strptime(timestamp, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3N") | eval url = case(event_type=="drift-baseline-detected", DRIFT_URL.'payload.baseline_id', event_type=="report-upload-failed", INVENTORY_URL.'payload.host_id', event_type=="policy-triggered", POLICIES_URL.'payload.policy_id', event_type="compliance-below-threshold", COMPLIANCE_URL.'payload.host_id', !isnull('payload.rule_url'), 'payload.rule_url') | eval event_type = case(event_type=="resolved-recommendation", "Resolved recommendation", event_type=="new-recommendation", "New recommendation", event_type=="deactivated-recommendation", "Deactivated recommendation", event_type=="policy-triggered","Policy triggered", event_type=="drift-baseline-detected","Drift from baseline detected", event_type=="compliance-below-threshold","System is non compliant to SCAP policy", event_type=="report-upload-failed","Policy report failed to upload", !isnull(event_type), 'event_type') | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(time) AS created_at_fmt | table created_at_fmt, account_id, "application", "event_type", "context.display_name", title, url | sort -created_at_fmt | rename account_id as "Account", created_at_fmt as "Timestamp", context.display_name as "System", event_type as "Event type", "title" as "Description", "application" as "Application"
